name: Pandora Project
description:
Visual Novel Made for GMTK GameJam.

The description is currently under development.

Story

A non-governmental organization known as Zeus started the Pandora project. An experiment of transplanting human brain cells with the machine. Despite being funded exclusively by the mayor of Neo-Green City and well supported by the 'elites', the project disgusts by The Neo-Native, an independent group of three who knows the dirty secrets of Zeus. Karl, Frye, and Sarif are working together on a mission to collect the database of the said project, breaching into Zeus's office.
